channel.title: CiTR -- Raw Radio (2008)
channel.description: Raw Radio is music at its finest. Hosted by J.T. James every week featuring the best in Canadian and International beat based music (hip hop, house, electro, breaks). Tune in and check it out.
channel.itunes:summary: Raw Radio is music at its finest. Hosted by J.T. James every week featuring the best in Canadian and International beat based music (hip hop, house, electro, breaks). Tune in and check it out.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.description: Hey guys, another eposode of raw radio went on without a hitch, next week Kay Dub will not be with us, The show will still be hotrawradio canada for all the details on playlist and all other information

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jun-2007
item.description:
well the city misses the reign today,although the reign is in toronto, j reign that is, doing his thing up in toronto for the stylus awards, reppin raw radio hard i hope and trust. lol
any ways tonight we had natural, jt james and ya boy kay dub, had a really hot show tonight, keeping it moving through the night with lotsa fresh CANADIAN TRACK< ppe them all they are very fresh

item.title: Broadcast on 24-May-2007
item.description:
Funky fresh and dressed ready to party,
With highlights from the New Album From Discret Da Chosen 1, choice cutz From the Pman, Jt James and Strange Fruit Project, raw radio yet again has kept you on your toes and stimulated your drums(eardrums that is).
Keep up on our website at www.rawradiocanada.com for all the details and inside information on the playlists and the activists.
peace
JT JAMES J REIGN KAY DUB

item.title: Broadcast on 17-May-2007
item.description: Tonight, we fight , we fight for raw radio, back on the air, Jreign kicks it with hot hot jams to spread over the bread that is you eardrums. listen in, tune the world out, keep the peace in the middle east blah blah blah, its RAW ,WE ARE BACK. RAW RADIO CANADA
item.itunes:subtitle: Those boys lost one but are now back on
